options.title: -f
options.description: restrict action or display to function names and definitions

options.title: -F
options.description: restrict display to function names only (plus line number and source file when debugging)

options.title: -g
options.description: create global variables when used in a shell function; otherwise ignored

options.title: -I
options.description: if creating a local variable, inherit the attributes and value of a variable with the same name at a previous scope

options.title: -p
options.description: display the attributes and value of each NAME

options.title: -a
options.description: to make NAMEs indexed arrays (if supported)

options.title: -A
options.description: to make NAMEs associative arrays (if supported)

options.title: -i
options.description: to make NAMEs have the `integer' attribute

options.title: -l
options.description: to convert the value of each NAME to lower case on assignment

options.title: -n
options.description: make NAME a reference to the variable named by its value

options.title: -t
options.description: to make NAMEs have the `trace' attribute

options.title: -u
options.description: to convert the value of each NAME to upper case on assignment
